name: Carter Flygare, Inc.
about: Carter Flygare, Inc., located at the Executive Airport in Sacramento, has been providing top-notch flight training since 1964. Led by President and Chief Pilot Carter W. Flygare, the school offers a wide range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) licenses. With a fleet of well-maintained aircraft, including Cessna 152, C172, Debonair, and Seminole models equipped with advanced avionics, students can train in various categories such as single-engine and multi-engine land and sea aircraft. The school is open 7 days a week, catering to both local and international students, and is known for its personalized instruction and supportive environment. Carter and his wife Heidy ensure a seamless experience, handling all administrative tasks while providing exceptional flight training. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot, Carter Flygare, Inc. is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
